name: Riddle 1
description: Please come closer, you must understand, I simply cannot see. I've lived long, far from your school, with my humongous family.

name: Riddle 2
description: In old English, my name means bumblebee, and the Order of Merlin First Class was given to me.

name: Riddle 3
description: Our victory in the 1994 Quidditch World Cup drew cheers from some, but certainly not from Viktor Krum.

name: Riddle 4
description: Going to the kitchens? Well don't forget! Tickle me, or access you will not get.

name: Riddle 5
description: Towards the Slytherin students, people say I showed bias, I am the son of Eileen and Tobias

name: Riddle 6
description: My code name on 'Potter Watch' was Romulus, surely you can guess who I am, without too much fuss?

name: Riddle 7
description: Enter Hogwarts and 142 of these you can see, just be sure to tread carefully.

name: Riddle 8
description: This shapeshifter lurks in dark places, and takes the form of your deepest fears, see the terror as it nears?

name: Riddle 9
description: Scared of the dark? Save yourself the fright, utter this word to help you see the light.

name: Riddle 10
description: Harry used Polyjuice potion and his body became fuller, but add one of Harry's hairs to the potion, and it will become this colour

name: Riddle 11
description: Buckbeak was a hipogriff, considered by Hagrid to be tame, but after the death of Sirius, he was given what name?

name: Riddle 12
description: Red of hair, and loyal to the end, but what is the middle name of Harry's best friend?
